_xResult.title: Me and Baby Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made asymmetrical dress with ruffled sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Like an image passing by, this custom made midi dress grabs attention quickly and still lingers long after you’ve walked by. This made to measure dress is 100% pure, soft brushed cotton, which keeps it light despite the billowing bodice and extravagantly ruffled sleeves. Super versatile, you can wear this designer dress with a thick tie belt, synched at the waist or loose and buttoned up.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
